nodes.bodyText: I think we could add authorization to this method, allowing only SELF and PERUNADMIN to perform the operation. However, I am not sure if it is needed. What do you think @zlamalp ?
This will be called by non-authorized user, so we can't check the caller against the user inside the request. For now it has to be without authorization.
You shouldn't mention empty return in javadoc.
